duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for recording and posting various journal entries to ensure accuracy of financial statements.
Analyze accounts, verify amounts, and correct errors to ensure accuracy of financial statements.
Prepare and post journal entries, maintain appropriate journals, and produce reports for analyzing accounts.
Analyze and reconcile accounts related to inventory and accounts receivable.
Reconcile operating account bank statements and prepare reports for tax filings.
Perform cost accounting analysis and support annual budgeting and forecasting.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting or Business Administration (Master's preferred)
